translation: adj.丑陋的；难看的；令人困窘的；令人不愉快的
examples: (1) Toads have an ugly appearance but they are useful.(2) You can't persuade me to buy this ugly vase!(3) His face was covered in ugly red blotches.(4) What an ugly mug!(5) This is an ugly situation.(6) I heard an ugly rumour that they are going to shut all the pubs on Sundays.
(1) 蟾蜍外表丑陋，但很有用。(2) 你不能劝服我买这个丑陋的花瓶！(3) 他脸上有许多难看的红色大斑点。(4) 多难看的脸！(5) 这是个令人困窘的情况。(6) 我听到一个令人不愉快的传闻，说是星期天所有的酒店都将关门。

translation: abbr.(=United Nations) 联合国pron.人，事物，家伙，东西
examples: (1) abbr.(=United Nations) 联合国(2) pron.人，事物，家伙，东西

translation: adj.不能的；不会的
examples: (1) He is an able person, nothing is unable to him.(2) Despite our great advances in microbiology, we are still unable to differentiate these organisms that cause the different infections.
(1) 他是一个能人，对他没有不能的事。(2) 不管我们的在微生物学的大进展，我们仍然是不能的区分引起不同的感染的这些有机体。

translation: adj.无法忍受的
examples: (1) The uncertainty is unbearable!(2) The politician found the piteous cries of the starving children unbearable.
(1) 事情定不下来真让人难以忍受！(2) 这个政治家发现饥饿的孩子们可怜的哭声让人不忍心听下去。

translation: adj.难以置信的
examples: (1) They work with an unbelievable speed.(2) His ecstasy to the pop music is unbelievable.
(1) 他们以令人难以置信的速度工作。(2) 他对流行音乐的入迷是令人难以置信的。

translation: adj.不确定的；不稳定的；易变的
examples: (1) Life on earth is short and uncertain.(2) I'm uncertain whether to go or not.(3) It seems uncertain why he lost the election.(4) I told him what I thought of him in no uncertain terms!(5) This is a very uncertain time for the global economy.(6) The uncertain weather delayed our departure.
(1) 地面上的生命是短暂而不确定的。(2) 我不能肯定去还是不去。(3) 他落选的原因似乎并不清楚。(4) 我毫不含糊地把我对他的看法告诉了他。(5) 当前全球经济正面临一个极不稳定的时期。(6) 天气变换莫测，延误了我们启程。

translation: adj.不舒服的；不自在的
examples: (1) But women alway wear uncomfortable shoes.(2) I'm uncomfortable being introduced to a new person.(3) And looking uncomfortable made me look terrible!
(1) 可是女人们总是穿不舒服的鞋子。(2) 你会觉得给别人介绍你才去的时候有不自在的感觉吗？(3) 不舒服自在的穿着，使我看起来糟透了。

translation: adj.无条件的；无限制的；绝对的
examples: (1) Discharge may be conditional or unconditional.(2) On the plaintiff's application for summary judgment the master give the defendant unconditional leave to defend.(3) This war's objective is less than the unconditional defeat of the enemy.(4) It has unconditional sovereignty over the state.
(1) 解除责任可以是有条件或无条件的。(2) 原告一提出即判决申请后，法院书记官无条件允许被告进行辩护。(3) 这场战争的目的决不是无限制地打败敌人。(4) 它对国家有绝对的权威。

translation: adj.失去知觉的；无意的
examples: (1) He lay unconscious in a pool of blood.(2) This wounded soldier was unconscious from his loss of blood.(3) He is unconscious of having made a serious error.(4) I was unconscious of her presence.
(1) 他失去知觉，躺在血泊之中。(2) 这名伤员由于失血过多而昏迷不醒。(3) 他未察觉到已犯了严重的错误。(4) 我不知道她在场。

translation: v.在…下面划线；强调
examples: (1) Please underline the important items.(2) In writing you should underline titles of books.(3) These different roles underline the importance of these cells.
(1) 请在重要事项的下面划线。(2) 写作时你该在书名下画线。(3) 这些不同的作用强调了这些细胞的重要性。

translation: n.理解；非正式协议；谅解；同情心adj.有同情心的
examples: (1) Love is the byname of understanding and care.(2) Such matters transcend human understanding.(3) A knowledge of economics is fundamental to any understanding of this problem.(4) We have reached an understanding with them.(5) There is an understanding between us that we will not sell to each other's customers.(6) We could count on benevolent understanding.(7) She showed great love and understanding.
(1) 爱是理解和体贴的别名。(2) 这些事情是人类所无法理解的。(3) 经济知识对于理解这个问题是至关重要的。(4) 我们和他们达成了协议。(5) 我们有个协议，不向对方的顾客出售货物。(6) 我们可以指望得到善意的谅解。(7) 她表现出极大的爱和同情。

translation: v.承担；从事；保证；答应
examples: (1) We could undertake the work for the time being.(2) We shall undertake the construction of this bridge.(3) Whatever I may undertake in the coming years, I don't need your help.(4) I can not undertake that you will make a profit.(5) He undertook to finish the job by Friday.
(1) 我们可暂时承担这项工作。(2) 我们将负责这座桥的修建工程。(3) 未来无论我从事什么,我都不需要你的帮助。(4) 我不能保证你会获利。(5) 他答应星期五之前完成这项工作。

translation: n.内衣
examples: (1) She changes her undarweer every day.(2) My mother has bought the thermal underwear for me.
(1) 她每天换内衣内裤。(2) 我妈妈已经给我买了保暖内衣。

translation: adj.专一的；没分开的
examples: (1) You have my full and undivided attention.(2) An undivided nation is the efforts of everyone in this country.
(1) 你是我一心一意注意的人。(2) 统一的名族需要这个国家每一个人的努力。

translation: v.解开；松开；取消
examples: (1) Would you please undo this knot for me?(2) He tried to undo the knot by picking at it with his fingers.(3) To return a database to its state as of the last committed change, i.e., to undo recent uncommitted changes.(4) A compensating transaction means that a new transaction will undo the effects of previous transactions.
(1) 你能不能帮我把这个结解开？(2) 他用手指不停地扯，想把绳结解开。(3) 使一个数据库返回到它上次已确认的改变之后的状态，即取消最近的尚未确认的变动。(4) 补偿事务的意思是一个新事物会用于取消前一个事务的所有效果。

translation: n.失业；失业人数
examples: (1) Mass unemployment may lead to social upheaval.(2) The specter of unemployment haunted the land.(3) The decrease in unemployment was 30 percent.(4) One deals with unemployment claims.
(1) 大批失业会导致社会动乱。(2) 失业的恐怖笼罩全国。(3) 失业人数减少了百分之三十。(4) 一个涉及到失业人数情况。

translation: adj.不公平的；(商业上)不正当的
examples: (1) The detention of the whole class was unfair.(2) It's unfair to devalue anyone's work unjustly.
(1) 滞留全班学生是不公平的。(2) 不公正地贬低任何人的工作都是不公平的。

translation: adj.不合适的；不健康的vt.使不合格
examples: (1) The water is unfit for drinking.(2) This house is unfit for human habitation.(3) She was unfit for such a senior position.(4) The army rejected him as medically unfit.(5) You're very unfit; you ought to take up running.
(1) 这水不宜饮用。(2) 这所房子不适合人居住。(3) 她不能胜任这样的高级职位。(4) 由于体检不合格，部队未接收他。(5) 你身体很弱，应该练练跑步。

translation: v.展开；开放；显露
examples: (1) The war seemed to unfold in the blink of an eye.(2) That's how life tends to unfold before us.(3) She seemed to unfold like a strong white lily under this genial breath of admiration and homage.(4) A walk through town will unfold many interesting buildings.
(1) 这场战争在眨眼间就展开了。(2) 生活就是这样在我们前面展开。(3) 她似乎在这赞赏和尊敬的真诚氛围之中象一朵白色的水仙那样猛烈地开放了。(4) 一条穿越城镇的行道将显露很多有趣的建筑物。

translation: adj.不幸的；令人遗憾的n.不幸的人
examples: (1) The unfortunate man shot himself afterwards.(2) His indifference to future needs is unfortunate.(3) The poor unfortunate had starved to death.
(1) 那个不幸的男人后来开枪自杀了。(2) 他对未来的需要漠不关心真令人遗憾。(3) 这个可怜的倒霉蛋是饿死的。

translation: adv.不幸地；遗憾地
examples: (1) Unfortunately, I missed the last train.(2) Unfortunately, I hurt my knee when I fell down on the ice.(3) Unfortunately I am not aware of that.(4) Unfortunately, the restaurant he recommended fell far short of our expectations.
(1) 我不幸错过了末班火车。(2) 真不幸，我在冰上摔倒时摔伤了膝盖。(3) 遗憾的是，我不知道此事。(4) 遗憾的是,他推荐的餐厅与我们心目中的相去甚远。

translation: adj.不快乐的；不高兴的；不幸福的；不满的
examples: (1) I overheard them saying they were unhappy.(2) My heart bled for the poor unhappy children.(3) I was unhappy because of the discomforts of travel.(4) He was unhappy because of his separation from his mother.(5) She looked unhappy after she read the letter.(6) He told me about his unhappy childhood.(7) He repined against his unhappy lot.(8) We are unhappy about the way the doctor treated us.
(1) 我偶然听到他们说，他们很不快乐。(2) 我心里为这些不快乐的孩子们感到悲痛。(3) 我因为旅行的不适而感到不快。(4) 他因与母亲分离而感到不快。(5) 她看过信后显得挺不高兴。(6) 他对我讲了他不幸福的童年。(7) 他自叹命运多舛。(8) 我们对医生这样对待我们感到不满。

translation: adj.不健康的；有害健康的；病态的或不正常的
examples: (1) The sick boy had an unhealthy flush and must have contracted pneumonia.(2) French fries are unhealthy food.(3) We must get rid of the unhealthy living habits.(4) Their slavish devotion to the leader is unhealthy.(5) He had an unhealthy interest in disease and death.
(1) 病孩子脸上有一种不健康的红晕，一定是感染上肺炎了。(2) 薯条不是健康的食物。(3) 我们必须改掉不健康的生活方式。(4) 他们对领导的盲目崇拜是不健康的。(5) 他对疾病与死亡有病态的兴趣。

translation: n.制服adj.一致的；统一的
examples: (1) He looks very manly in his uniform.(2) The students are wearing school uniforms.(3) The rows of houses were uniform in appearance.(4) Their internal temperatures are essentially uniform with the environment.(5) Lack of uniform standards is a problem.(6) Now many bus routes in this city charge two yuan as a uniform fare.
(1) 他穿着制服十分精神。(2) 学生们穿着校服。(3) 这一排排的房屋外表都是一样的。(4) 它们的体温与周围环境基本上是一致的。(5) 尚缺乏统一标准规定。(6) 现在,这座城市的许多公交路线无论距离远近都统一收取两元车费。

translation: adj.不重要的
examples: (1) Relatively speaking, this matter is unimportant.(2) Don't quibble about unimportant things with me.
(1) 相对来说，这事并不重要。(2) 别为了琐碎的小事和我狡辩。

translation: n.结合；工会；联盟；和睦；连接轴；【数】并，并集adj.联邦政府的；工会的
examples: (1) They had a sound basis of union.(2) He was elected the leader of the union.(3) He has changed his stance on monetary union.(4) All the nationalities live together in perfect union.(5) Nine States seceded from the Union government and established their own confederate government.(6) Some of the union members did not want to picket.(7) A democrat usually gets the union's endorsement.
(1) 他们的结合有着坚实的基础。(2) 他被选为工会的领导人。(3) 他已经改变了对货币联盟的态度。(4) 各族人民非常和睦地生活在一起。(5) 九个州脱离联邦政府,成立了自己的邦联政府。(6) 工会的一些会员不想担任罢工纠察员。(7) 民主主义者通常都得到工会的支持。

translation: adj.独特的；独一无二的；稀罕的
examples: (1) He occupies a unique place in English literature.(2) The elephant's trunk is a unique form of appendage.(3) The custom is unique to the region.(4) Her style of writing is rather unique.
(1) 他在英国文学中占有独特的地位。(2) 象的鼻子是一种独特的附肢。(3) 这种风俗是这一地区特有的。(4) 她的写作风格很不寻常。

translation: n.单元；单位；部件；组件
examples: (1) This textbook has twenty units.(2) There's a rumour floating around of a new job in the unit.(3) The family is the smallest social unit.(4) Cubit is an ancient unit of length.(5) What's the unit cost?(6) Remove the letter printing unit.(7) The IPP, my second example, is a sophisticated turbine that acts as the auxiliary power unit on engine starts.
(1) 这本课本有二十单元。(2) 这个部门盛传有个新工作要聘人。(3) 家庭是社会最小的单位。(4) 腕尺是古代的一种长度单位。(5) 单位成本是多少钱?(6) 移开贺卡组件。(7) 综合动力组件，也就是我所举的第二个例子，是一台在发动机启动过程中扮演辅助动力角色的技术成熟的涡轮发动机。

translation: v.联合；合并；统一；团结
examples: (1) They unite to form a new company.(2) The more of the masses we unite with, the better.(3) Two major telecommunication providers will unite into one.(4) The oceans do not divide the world so much as unite it.(5) We must unite as many people as possible.
(1) 他们联合组成一个新公司。(2) 我们联合起来的群众越多，就越有利。(3) 两大主要的电信提供商会合并成一家。(4) 与其说是海洋分割这个世界,不如说是统一这个世界。(5) 我们要团结尽可能多的人。

translation: adj.普遍的；全世界的；宇宙的；全体的；通用的n.通用原理，普遍原则
examples: (1) These phenomena is very universal.(2) Overpopulation is a universal problem.(3) Music has been called the universal language.(4) The doer is a universal structure.(5) A universal theory cannot be induced from a finite number of facts.(6) Americans strongly favour the introduction of universal health care.(7) Therefore any attempt at a universal tool set also proves futile.(8) There are no economic universals.
(1) 这些现象己经非常普遍了。(2) 人口过多是全球性的问题。(3) 人们称音乐为世界的语言。(4) 行事者是一个宇宙的结构。(5) 一项宇宙的学说不能从有限数目的事实归纳而得。(6) 美国人强烈赞同推行覆盖全体国民的医保制度。(7) 因此,任何建立一个通用工具集的尝试被认为是徒劳的。(8) 英语是一种世界通用的语言。

translation: adj.未知的；不出名的
examples: (1) I braced myself for the unknown.(2) Its greater part is unknown to me.(3) He was an unknown novelist then.(4) No one could match the skill of the unknown carver.
(1) 我准备好了去接受未知的命运。(2) 它的大部分对我是未知的。(3) 当时他是位不出名的小说家。(4) 没有哪个人的技艺能比得上那位不出名的雕刻家。

translation: conj.除非；如果不prep.除 ... 外
examples: (1) I won't go to the party unless I'm invited.(2) I sleep with the window open unless its really cold.(3) Iron corrodes unless it is greased or kept clean.(4) Nothing could stop me from waiting for you to come back unless death.
(1) 除非我被邀请，否则我不会去参加晚会的。(2) 我总是开著窗户睡觉，除非天气非常冷才关上窗户。(3) 如果不涂油或保持清洁铁便会腐蚀。(4) 除了死亡再没有别的事物能够阻止我等待你回来。

translation: adj.未婚的；独身的n.未婚者
examples: (1) His unmarried sisters were left quite unprovided for in the will.(2) More and more unmarried people prefer to live with their families.(3) He remained unmarried all his life.(4) Though he is forty,he is still unmarried.
(1) 他在遗嘱中没有给他的未婚姐妹留下财产。(2) 越来越多未婚的人喜欢和家人一起生活。(3) 他终生未娶。(4) 尽管他已经40岁了,但还是独身。

translation: adj.使人不愉快的；讨厌的；不合意的；不友好的，粗鲁的
examples: (1) It happened with unpleasant consequences.(2) He was about to mingle in an unpleasant affair.(3) That girl is a very unpleasant cup of tea.(4) They always pick on him to do the unpleasant jobs.
(1) 这件事产生了令人不愉快的后果。(2) 他会陷入一桩不愉快的事情。(3) 那女孩是个非常讨厌的人。(4) 他们总找他去做那些令人讨厌的差事。

translation: n.不安；动乱；动荡的局面
examples: (1) There's (a feeling of) unrest in the air.(2) The unrest erupted into revolution.(3) People are predicting civil unrest in the area.(4) Politic unrest will cause economic instability.
(1) 四处充满了不安(的感觉)。(2) 动乱爆发为革命。(3) 人们预言该地区将发生动乱。(4) 政治动荡会导致经济不稳定。

translation: adj.不安全的；危险的；靠不住的
examples: (1) The auto- maker recalls a lot of cars that are unsafe.(2) She lives in an unsafe city.(3) It's unsafe for her to go alone.
(1) 汽车制造商召回许多不安全的车辆。(2) 她住在一个不安全的城市中。(3) 她单独去是很危险的。

translation: adj.不成功的；失败的
examples: (1) My early attempts at learning to drive were unsuccessful.(2) He was discouraged by the unsuccessful attempt.(3) The unsuccessful candidate demanded a re-count.(4) After a series of unsuccessful attempts, he has finally passed the driving test.
(1) 我曾经几次打算学开车，却都没有学成。(2) 这次不成功的尝试使他气馁。(3) 那个落选的候选人要求重新计算选票。(4) 经过连续几次的失败，他最后终于通过了驾驶考试。

translation: adj.不真实的；不正确的；不忠实的；不符合(标准、原则等)的
examples: (1) He exclaimed that it was untrue.(2) Your allegations are completely untrue, and I demand an immediate apology.(3) It appears that what I said was untrue, but I did not knowingly lie to you.(4) But now he never felt guilty about being untrue to them.(5) He was untrue to type when he said that.
(1) 他大声说那不是事实。(2) 你的说法完全不真实，我要求立即道歉。(3) 看来我说错了，但是我并非故意向你撒谎。(4) 但是目前他对她们不忠，他却一点儿不感到内疚。(5) 他那样说不合他的本性。

translation: adj.不愿意的
examples: (1) I am unwilling to set a precedent.(2) Nothing is easy to the unwilling.(3) He is unwilling to accept advice.(4) He is unwilling to acknowledge defeat.(5) If you are unwilling, don't hesitate to say no.
(1) 我不想开先例。(2) 人不情愿事事难。(3) 他不愿意接受忠告。(4) 他不愿认输。(5) 如果你不愿意,请直说吧。

translation: prep.在 ... 上；紧接着；逼近
examples: (1) All our hopes rested upon this venture.(2) Upon his release, Davis went immediately to his mother.(3) Christmas is almost upon us again.
(1) 我们所有的希望都寄托在这次冒险上了。(2) 戴维斯一被释放就立即回到了母亲身边。(3) 圣诞节又快到了。

translation: adj.较高的；上面的；上部的n.鞋帮；上铺n.兴奋剂；令人兴奋的经历
examples: (1) The upper valley is also noted for its valuable woodland and birds.(2) He locked his diary in the upper drawer.(3) The upper side of a leaf is known as the adaxial surface.(4) It also features a laser etched graphic over the upper.(5) Octagons in the olympic colors are spread all over the upper in the form of prints.(6) Do you prefer an upper or a lower berth?
(1) 在较高的山谷也有不少珍贵树林和雀鸟。(2) 他把日记锁在上层抽屉里。(3) 叶子的上部被称为近轴表面。(4) 它也以在鞋帮的激光被铭刻的图表为特色。(5) 以印刷品的形式，在奥林匹克颜色的八角形物在鞋帮被传播。(6) 你想要上铺还是下铺?

translation: adj.心烦的；苦恼的；不安的；不适的v.推翻；翻倒；颠覆；打乱；使心烦n.混乱；推翻
examples: (1) I'm always upset when I don't get any mail.(2) There is no reason to get so upset.(3) Try not to get too upset about it.(4) I'm suffering from an upset stomach.(5) The generals plotted to upset the government.(6) He upset a bottle of ink.(7) A flurry of wind upset the small boat.(8) The foreign team upset the local team.(9) In fact, it's inorganic chemistry and it has upset the aquatics world.(10) The whole plan was upset owing to his absence.(11) The news completely upset them.(12) Last-minute changes caused a great deal of upset.(13) The generals plotted to upset the government.(14) Conflict in North Korea or the toppling of Kim Jong Il's government there could upset both of those goals, Chinese analysts say.

(1) 我接不到任何邮件时总是心烦意乱。(2) 完全没有理由如此心烦意乱。(3) 尽量不要过于为此烦恼。(4) 我的肠胃正不舒服着呢。(5) 将军们策划推翻政府。(6) 他打翻了一瓶墨水。(7) 一阵疾风吹翻了小船。(8) 这个外来队竟把地方队给颠覆了。(9) 实际上，这种新型泳衣就是无机化学的产物，它已经颠覆了整个水上运动界。(10) 由于他没来,整个计划都给打乱了。(11) 这消息使他们极为心烦。(12) 出现的临时变动造成一片混乱。(13) 将军们策划推翻政府。(14) 中国分析家说，如果在朝鲜发生冲突或是推翻金正日政权，那么会使这两个目标的实现受挫。

translation: adj.向上的；上升的adv.向上；上升
examples: (1) We must keep a healthy and upward mood.(2) An upward force must be exerted on it so as to lift an object.(3) The deruralization of the world is on a fast upward curve.(4) His glaring eyes are looking straight upward.(5) The Far East has a general upward trend.(6) The smoke from the camp fire curled upward.
(1) 要保持健康向上的心态。(2) 要提起重物必须向它施加一个向上的力。(3) 世界的脱离乡村是个快速上升的曲线。(4) 他怒视的双眼直向上看。(5) 远东全面向上增加。(6) 烟自营火缭绕上升。

translation: adj.城市的；都市的
examples: (1) In some developing countries more and more people are migrating to urban areas.(2) The quality of urban living has been damaged by excessive noise levels.(3) You can find out many advantages in urban life.
(1) 在某些发展中的国家,越来越多的人向市区迁移。(2) 城市生活的质量已被过度的噪音所破坏。(3) 你会发现都市生活中有许多便利之处。

translation: vt.驱策；鼓励；催促；力陈vi.极力主张n.冲动；强烈愿望
examples: (1) He urged the horses on with a whip.(2) Many physicians urge aerobic exercise.(3) We will urge them to adhere to the Paris Agreement.(4) They urged on us the need for cooperation.(5) I strongly urge you to give up smoking.(6) I feel the urge to be outside when spring comes again.(7) An urge to improve society led me into politics.(8) When the urge to create a cellar happens it's usually at the beginning of your wine appreciation career.
(1) 他用鞭子策马前行。(2) 很多医生鼓励有氧运动。(3) 我们将敦促他们遵守巴黎协议。(4) 他们向我们强调合作的必要性。(5) 我力劝你戒烟。(6) 当春天再次来临,我就有了到户外活动的冲动。(7) 推动社会进步的强烈愿望使我投身于政治。(8) 当你有强烈愿望要建一个酒窖时，通常是你的葡萄酒鉴赏生涯的开始。

translation: adj.紧急的；急迫的；坚持要求的
examples: (1) They've made an urgent request for international aid.(2) I was prevented from going by urgent business.(3) Jean spoke, her voice low and urgent.
(1) 他们紧急请求国际援助。(2) 我因急事不能去。(3) 吉恩说话的时候声音压得很低,感觉很急迫。

translation: adj.无用的；无效的
examples: (1) It was an intense but useless struggle.(2) Please cancel the words which are useless.(3) When the umpire says you are out, it is useless to argue because his decision is irrevocable.
(1) 这是一场剧烈而无用的挣扎。(2) 请把无用的词划掉。(3) 当裁判宣布你出局时，任何辩解都是无效的，因为他的判决不可更改。

translation: n.用户；使用者
examples: (1) It allows the user to enter data on a keyboard.(2) Yes , I am an existing MERP user.(3) The user interacts with the computer.(4) Expand User Configuration to set restrictions on a per-user basis.
(1) 字处理软件允许用户在键盘上输入数据。(2) 是，我是现代教育资源库的用户。(3) 使用者同计算机对话。(4) 展开用户配置来设置在个别使用者为基础的限制。

translation: int. 嗯（表示迟疑）n. (Um)人名；(柬)温；(阿拉伯)乌姆
examples: Um... that'll suit me perfectly.Um, I was watching TV with my husband.
嗯...... 那很好。嗯，我和我丈夫在看电视。

translation: n. 雨伞；保护伞；庇护；伞形结构
examples: The wind blew my umbrella inside out.You should take an umbrella just as a precaution.Can you identify your umbrella among this lot?She was holding up an umbrella.An umbrella will protect you from the rain.Those small states are under the umbrella of the super power.
风把我的伞吹得翻过去了。你该带把伞，有备无患。你能在这些伞中认出你自己的伞吗？她打着雨伞。雨伞可以保护你不致雨淋。那些小国在超级大国的庇护之下。

translation: adj. 不会的，不能的；[劳经] 无能力的；不能胜任的
examples: He is an able person, nothing is unable to him.Despite our great advances in microbiology, we are still unable to differentiate these organisms that cause the different infections.
他是一个能人，对他没有不能的事。不管我们的在微生物学的大进展，我们仍然是不能的区分引起不同的感染的这些有机体。

translation: adj. 牢不可破的；不易破损的
examples: Are they made of unbreakable glass?This new material is virtually unbreakable.Marriage in the U. S. Is not an unbreakable bond.The friendship between our two countries is unbreakable.
是不会破裂的镜片吗?这种新材料实际上是不碎的。在美国,婚姻不再是一种不可打破的联系。我们两国之间有着牢不可破的友谊。

translation: n. 叔叔；伯父；伯伯；舅父；姨丈；姑父
examples: My uncle is a professor in this university.They are not really my aunt and uncle.My uncle is a sure-enough cowboy.My uncle has an apple orchard.Although my uncle is old, he looks very strong and healthy.These words seemed to rouse Uncle Vernon.
我的伯父是这所大学的一名教授。其实他们并不是我的姑姑和姑父。我舅舅是个地道的牛仔。我叔叔拥有一个苹果园。我的叔叔虽然老了，但他看上去还是很健壮。这句话似乎唤醒了弗农姨父。

translation: prep. 低于，少于；在...之下adv. 在下面；在下方adj. 下面的；从属的
examples: The watch cannot be sold for under 100 yuan.The total is under what was expected.No one under the rank of captain may enter the room.Many children under five go to nursery school.She sat very still under the tree.The swallows nested under the eaves.The machine is still under warranty.Life is better under the previous regime.Opium is classed under the head of narcotics.He's very much under the influence of the older boys.He kept the situation under control.I will pay nothing under compulsion.She felt herself going under.If you take a deep breath you can stay under for more than a minute.The ship went under on its first voyage.Can you see the under layer?
这块表低于100元不卖。总数低于预计数。级别低于上尉者禁止入内。5岁以下的许多儿童都上幼儿园。她在树底下静静地坐着。燕子在屋檐下筑巢。这台机器仍在保修期内在前一段统治期内生活较好。鸦片归在麻醉品项内。那些比他大的男孩对他影响很大。他把情势控制下来。在强迫之下我分文也不愿付。她感到渐渐失去了知觉。只要深吸一口气就能在水里待上一分多钟。那条船在首次航行时就沉没了。你能看到下面那层吗？

translation: adv. 在地下；秘密地adj. 地下的；秘密的；先锋派的n. 地下；地铁；地道；地下组织；秘密活动；先锋派团体
examples: Listen to the Sound From Underground.Underground water that is held in the soil and in pervious rocks.He is well known for his reports on underground crime and gangs.The insurrectionary detachments started in Yunghsin as an underground force,but they have come into the open since we captured the entire county.Moles stay underground most of the time.Torrential rivers are rumbling deep underground.They were making a plan underground.Enemy's spies work underground to collect our information.Moles stay underground most of the time.Torrential rivers are rumbling deep underground.I obtained it for one pound in the underground.They dived into the Underground to escape the rain.The prisoner escaped by digging an underground wunnel.We were forced to move underground, to the tunnels here.The spy never told his family about his underground activities.

听听地下的声音。土壤和能渗透的岩石中含有的地下的水。他因为关于报道秘密的犯罪和帮派而出名。暴动队始于永新，原是秘密的，夺取全县以后，公开了。钱鼠大部分时间住在地下。急流在地下深处隆隆奔腾。他们在秘密地策划。敌人的间谍秘密地收集我们的情报。钱鼠大部分时间住在地下。急流在地下深处隆隆奔腾。这是我在地铁花一英镑买来的。他们急忙钻进地铁避雨。囚犯挖了一条地道逃跑了。我们被迫撤向地下，来到了这些地道里。这位间谍从未把他的秘密活动告诉家里人。

translation: vt. 理解；懂；获悉；推断；省略；明白vi. 理解；懂得；熟悉
examples: He is trying his best to understand his meaning.I don't understand what you're talking about.If you can't do it, I will understand.I don't fully understand his reasons for leaving.You must understand the gravity of the situation.I understand that you will be moving here soon.I understand that you are now married.We understand your corporation handles foodstuffs for export.
他正在尽力弄明白他的意思。我不明白你在说什么。如果你不会做这件事的话，我可以理解。我不完全理解他离开的理由。你必须认识到局势的严重性。我听说你就要搬到这儿来住了。我听说你现在已结婚了。我们获悉你公司经营食品出口。

translation: n. 宇宙；世界；领域
examples: The universe exists in space.The depth of the universe is immeasurable.The Earth is only one of the numerous planets in the universe.Man is the soul of the universe.That is the most wicked place in the universe.I have no idea how large the physical universe is.
宇宙存在于太空。宇宙无限深广。地球只是宇宙中众多星球中的一个。人是万物之灵。那是世界上最最邪恶的地方。我不知道物质世界有多大。

translation: n. 大学；综合性大学；大学校舍
examples: John is one of his alumni in the university.My uncle is a professor in this university.There are many foreign professors in this university.She majored in maths and physics at university.He is a member of the Association of University Teachers.
约翰是他大学时的校友之一。我的伯父是这所大学的一名教授。这所大学有许多外国教授。她在大学期间主修数学和物理。他是大学教师联合会的一名成员。

translation: adj. 不同的，不相似的prep. 和…不同，不像
examples: The two sisters are unlike in disposition.His new novel is unlike all his previous ones.Unlike a loan, a grant does not have to be repaid.It was so unlike him to yield to such an irrational impulse!
那两姊妹性情不一样。他新出的这部小说与他以前的不同。不像贷款，补助金不需要还款。他如此冲动，如此不顾理智，实在有失常态。

translation: conj. 在…以前；直到…时prep. 在…以前；到…为止
examples: The heat did not relax until midnight.We did not notice this matter until yesterday.She can't leave until Friday.He put off his departure until his sister came.I didn't wake up until I heard the alarm clock.You can't leave until your work is finished.I was in the dark about it until she told me.She sticks to the work until it is finished.
直到半夜，炎热才缓解。直到昨天我们才注意到这件事。在星期五之前她不能离开。他推迟行期,直到他妹妹来了之后才走。直到听到闹钟的铃声我才醒来。在你的工作完成之前,你不能离开。这件事在她告诉我之前，我毫不知情。她坚持工作,直到把工作完成为止。

translation: adj. 不寻常的；与众不同的；不平常的
examples: I look on the matter as most unusual.Something unusual was about to happen.Mr. Heath was a man of unusual character.Her unusual utterance revealed her emotions.Our host descried a gentleman of unusual appearance standing at the far end of the hall.
我认为这件事极不寻常。某种不寻常的事正要发生。希思先生具有独特的个性。她不同寻常的语调暴露出她的感情。我们的男主人远远看到有个外表不俗的绅士站在大厅的尽头。

translation: adv. 起来；上涨；向上prep. 在…之上；向…的较高处adj. 涨的；起床的；向上的n. 上升；繁荣
examples: Put the packet up on the top shelf.I got up early this morning.The import of cotton goods went up sharply in 1981.The old man knocked the hoe handle up.It is an up elevator.The up train leaves every hour.The fuel prices are upping.We should up our output.
把这个包放到架子顶格上去。今天早晨我起床很早。一九八一年棉织品的进口量急遽上升。那位老人把锄头柄往上敲。这是向上运行的电梯。上行的火车每小时一班。燃料价格在上升。我们应该增加我们的产量。

translation: vt. 更新；校正，修正；使现代化n. 更新；现代化
examples: The data should be updated once a week.The feedback from the computer enables us to update the program.I would advise you to update the software.Maps need regular updates.This update corrects that potential error.
这些数据应该每星期更新一次。计算机的反馈能使我们更新程序。我建议你把这个软件升级。地图需要经常修订。此更新纠正了这一潜在错误。

translation: adv. 在楼上，向楼上；上楼；往楼上adj. 楼上的n. 楼上
examples: Jim lived upstairs.They tiptoed upstairs so as not to wake the baby.The boy ran upstairs quickly.We crept upstairs so as not to wake the baby.The plane tried to avoid a storm by going upstairs.He is all vacant upstairs.She doesn't use the upstairs at all any more.The upstairs rooms are much warmer than those on the ground floor.He is skilled in upstairs politics.
吉姆住在楼上。他们踮着脚上楼,生怕把孩子吵醒。男孩很快地跑上楼。为了不吵醒婴儿，我们蹑手蹑脚地上了楼梯。飞机往高空飞去，以避开风暴。他头脑里空空如也。她不再使用楼上了。楼上的房间要比底层的暖和得多。他精通上层政治。

translation: adj. 习惯的；二手的，使用过的v. 用（use的过去式）；（used to）过去常做
examples: He makes sweaters from used plastic bottles.I want to buy a used car at a cheap price.To save money, I purchased a used car instead of a new one.It's very different to what I'm used to.He has his own peculiar style which you'll soon get used to.
他利用使用过的塑料瓶罐来制造毛衣。我要以低廉价买一辆被使用过的车。为了省钱，我没买新车，而是买了辆二手的。这与我所习惯的大不相同。他有自己独特的风格，你会很快习惯的。

translation: adj. 有用的，有益的；有帮助的
examples: It is a useful book and, what is more, not an expensive one.The book contains much useful information.John always tries to cultivate people who are useful to him.A sauna in the hotel would be a useful amenity.She stopped hanging about and did something useful.This manual is full of useful tips.They are not only ornamental, but also useful.
这是有用的书，更难得的是不贵。这本书包含了许多有用的资料。约翰经常设法和对他有用的人结交。旅馆中的芬兰蒸汽浴室倒是个有益的好设施。她不再闲逛,而是做了些有益的工作。这本小册子里有很多实用的小建议。它们不但具有装饰性，而且是实用的。

translation: adj. 通常的，惯例的；平常的
examples: My usual bedtime is nine o'clock.His speech followed the usual pattern.The vintage was later than usual.As usual, there weren't many people at the meeting.Such was the usual tenor of their way.The letter was written in her usual acerbic style.It's usual to have a holiday in summer.We have mainly adopted some usual international practices.
我通常九点钟上床睡觉。他按照通常的方式讲话。那次葡萄采收期比平常年份晚。像往常一样，来开会的人不多。这便是他们惯常的作风。这封信是用她惯常的尖刻语调写的。夏天休假是惯例。我们主要采取了一些国际上的惯例做法。

translation: adv. 通常，经常
examples: I usually wake up early.Medicines are usually compounds.The herrings usually live in large shoals.They don't usually imprison first offenders.A man's voice is usually lower than a woman's.Children under five usually travel free on trains.The teacher usually worked on till late at night.
我通常醒得很早。药品通常是复合物。青鱼通常生活在大的浅水区。他们通常不监禁初次犯罪的人。男子的嗓音通常比女子的低。五岁以下的儿童乘火车通常免费。这位老师经常一直工作到深夜。

translation: 上上下下；到处；前前后后；来来往往
examples: They are getting up and down all the time.I've looked high and low for my wallet.The lion paced restlessly up and down in its cage.It takes me an hour to walk there and back.
它们总是不停地上上下下跑。我上上下下地找我的钱包。狮子在笼子里不安地来回走动。我步行一个来回用一小时。

translation: 惯于；过去经常
examples: I weigh less than I used to.Jack used to assist Mary in her lessons.I used to get up early and take an hour's walk before breakfast.Women used to think they were on the shelf at 30.
我的体重比以前轻了。杰克过去常常帮助玛丽学习功课。我过去常常起床很早并且在早餐前散步一小时。过去女人一到30岁就认为是过了结婚年龄。

translation: 过去常常，过去曾经；过去常常做某事
examples: He used to do a lot of drinking but has signed off now.He used to do such work as he could pick up.
他过去常常喝酒，但现在戒掉了。他惯常能够找到什么活就干什么活。
